name: ss026
info: All Packets according to SUBSET-026-7 v360

enums.name: QDir
enums.info: Validity direction of transmitted data. Qualifier to indicate the relevantvalidity direction of transmitted data, with reference to directionality of the balise group sending the information or to directionality of the LRBG, in case of information sent via radio.. Length of variable : 2 bits. Minimum Value : None.Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

enums.name: ETCSVersion
enums.info: M_VERSION:Version of ETCS system. This gives the version of the ETCS system. Each part indicates the first and second number of the version respectively. The first number distinguishes not compatible versions. (The three MSB’s)The second number indicates compatibility within a version X. (Thefour LSB’s). Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

enumLiterals.name: v_previous
enumLiterals.info: Previous version according toe.g. EEIG SRS, UIC A200 SRS (000XXXX)

enumLiterals.name: v_reserved
enumLiterals.info: Values from 0100010 to 1111111 are valid, but reserved for future use

enumLiterals.name: v_invalid
enumLiterals.info: Values from 0010010 to 0011111 are not valid

enums.name: NVContact
enums.info: M_NVCONTAC:T_NVCONTACT reaction. Indicates the reaction to be performedwhen T_NVCONTACT timer elapses This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 2 bits.

enums.name: KVType
enums.info: Type of Kv_int set. None. Length of variable : 2 bits. Comment : Only if Q_NVKINT = 1, Q_NVKVINTSET and the following variables follow

enumLiterals.name: spare
enumLiterals.info: binary values from 10 to 11 are spare

enums.name: LinkReaction
enums.info: Q_LINKREACTION: linking reaction. Qualifier for the reaction to be performed ifa linking or a balise group message consistency problem occurs with the balise group linked to.. Length of variable : 2 bits.

enumLiterals.name: ALC_spare
enumLiterals.info: binary values from 0001101 to 1111111 are spare

enums.name: TrackCondType
enums.info: M_TRACKCOND: Type of track condition.None. Length of variable : 4 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

enumLiterals.name: TCT_0000
enumLiterals.info: Non stopping area. Initial state: stopping permitted

enumLiterals.name: TCT_0001
enumLiterals.info: Tunnel stopping area. Initial state: no tunnel stopping area

enumLiterals.name: TCT_0010
enumLiterals.info: Sound horn. Initial state: no request for sound horn

enumLiterals.name: TCT_0011
enumLiterals.info: Powerless Section - lower pantograph. Initial state: not powerless section

enumLiterals.name: TCT_0100
enumLiterals.info: Radio hole (stop supervising T_NVCONTACT). Initial state: supervise T_NVCONTACT

enumLiterals.name: TCT_0101
enumLiterals.info: Air tightness. Initial state: no request for air tightness

enumLiterals.name: TCT_0110
enumLiterals.info: Switch off regenerative brake. Initial state: regenerative brake on

enumLiterals.name: TCT_0111
enumLiterals.info: Switch off eddy current brake for service brake. Initial state: eddy current brake for service brake on

enumLiterals.name: TCT_1000
enumLiterals.info: Switch off magnetic shoe brake. Initial state: magnetic shoe brake on

enumLiterals.name: TCT_1001
enumLiterals.info: Powerless section - switch off the main power switch. Initial state: not powerless section

enumLiterals.name: TCT_1010
enumLiterals.info: Switch off eddy current brake for emergency brake. Initial state: eddy current brake for emergency brake on

enums.name: PlatformType
enums.info: Type of platform. Nominal height of platform above rail level in mm (refer to TSI infrastructure). Length of variable : 4 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

enums.name: PlatformPosition
enums.info: Platform position (relative to direction of authorised movement).None. Length of variable : 2 bits

enums.name: TextClass
enums.info: Class of message to be displayed..Q_TEXTCLASS specifies the class of the text message included in the same packet (either plain or fixed message). Length of variable : 2 bits.

enums.name: DisplayOperatingMode
enums.info: Onboard operating mode for text display.The text is displayed when entering / as long as in the defined mode. Length of variable : 4 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : Start event

enums.name: DisplayOperatingLevel
enums.info: Onboard operating level for text display.The text is displayed when entering / as long as in the defined level. Length of variable : 3 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : Start event

enumLiterals.name: DOL_notLimited
enumLiterals.info: The display of the text shall not be limited by the level

enums.name: TextConfirmationType
enums.info: Qualifier for text confirmation.None. Length of variable : 2 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

enumLiterals.name: TCT_10
enumLiterals.info: Confirmation required: command application of the service brake when display end                 condition is fulfilled, unless the text has already been acknowledged by the driver

enumLiterals.name: TCT_11
enumLiterals.info: Confirmation required: command application of the emergency brake when display end              condition is fulfilled, unless the text has already been acknowledged by the driver

enums.name: MAMode
enums.info: Required mode for a part of the MA. None. Length of variable : 2 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : OS, LS, SH

enumLiterals.name: VT_none
enumLiterals.info: Line not fitted with any traction system

enumLiterals.name: VT_Spare
enumLiterals.info: binary values from 0110 to 1111 are spare

attrs.name: nid
attrs.info: packet id

attrs.name: nid_vbcmk
attrs.info: Marker for Virtual Balise Cover. minValue: 0, maxValue : 63

attrs.name: l_nvkrint_l
attrs.info: Train length step used to define the integrated correction factor Kr. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 5 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: m_nvkrint_l
attrs.info: Integrated correction factor Kr. This is the train length dependentintegrated correction factor. M_NVKRINT(l) is valid for a train length between L_NVKRINT(l) and L_NVKRINT(l+1).M_NVKRINT is valid between 0m and L_NVKRINT(1)This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 5 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1.55. Resolution/formula : 0.05. Comment : Valid between L_NVKRINT(l) andL_NVKRINT(l+1)

attrs.name: q_nvkint
attrs.info: Qualifier for integrated correction factors. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 1 bit.

attrs.name: a_nvp12
attrs.info: Lower deceleration limit to determine the set of Kv to be used. Lower deceleration limit to determine the set of correction factor Kv to be used for Conventional Passenger trains. This variable is part of the National Values.. Length of variable : 6 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m/s2. Maximum Value : 3.15 m/s2. Resolution/formula : 0.05 m/s2. Comment : Only if Q_NVKVINTSET = 1

attrs.name: a_nvp23
attrs.info: Upper deceleration limit to determine the set of Kv to be used. Upper deceleration limit to determine the set of correction factor Kv to be used for Conventional Passenger trains. This variable is part of the National Values.. Length of variable : 6 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m/s2. Maximum Value :3.15 m/s2. Resolution/formula : 0.05 m/s2. Comment : Only if Q_NVKVINTSET = 1

attrs.name: v_nvkvint
attrs.info: Speed step used to define the integrated correction factor Kv. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value: 600km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h. Comment : = 0 km/h

attrs.name: m_nvkvint
attrs.info: Integrated correction factor Kv. This is the speed dependent integrated correction factor. M_NVKVINT(n) is valid for an estimated speed between V_NVKVINT(n) and V_NVKVINT(n+1). M_NVKVINT is valid between 0 km/h and V_NVKVINT(1)This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 7bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 2.54. Resolution/formula : 0.02. Comment : Valid between V_NVKVINT and V_NVKVINT(1) If Q_NVKVINTSET = 1, gives the correction factor if maximum emergency brake deceleration is lower thanA_NVP12

attrs.name: m_nvkvint_2
attrs.info: Integrated correction factor Kv. This is the speed dependent integrated correction factor. M_NVKVINT(n) is valid for an estimated speed between V_NVKVINT(n) and V_NVKVINT(n+1). M_NVKVINT is valid between 0 km/h and V_NVKVINT(1)This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 2.54. Resolution/formula : 0.02. Comment : Only if Q_NVKVINTSET = 1 Valid between V_NVKVINT and V_NVKVINT(1) Gives the correction factor if maximum emergency brake deceleration is higherthan A_NVP23

attrs.name: m_nvkrint
attrs.info: Integrated correction factor Kr. This is the train length dependent integrated correction factor. M_NVKRINT(l) is valid for a train length between L_NVKRINT(l) and L_NVKRINT(l+1). M_NVKRINT is valid between 0m and L_NVKRINT(1)This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 5 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1.55. Resolution/formula : 0.05. Comment : Valid between L_NVKRINT and L_NVKRINT(1)

attrs.name: a_nvp12
attrs.info: Lower deceleration limit to determine the set of Kv to beused. Lower deceleration limit to determine the set of correction factor Kv to be used for Conventional Passenger trains. This variable is part of the National Values.. Length of variable : 6 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m/s2. Maximum Value :3.15 m/s2. Resolution/formula : 0.05 m/s2. Comment : Only if Q_NVKVINTSET = 1

attrs.name: a_nvp23
attrs.info: Upper deceleration limit to determine the set of Kv to be used. Upper deceleration limit to determine the set of correction factor Kv to be used for Conventional Passenger trains. This variable is part of the National Values.. Length of variable : 6 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m/s2. Maximum Value :3.15 m/s2. Resolution/formula : 0.05 m/s2. Comment : Only if Q_NVKVINTSET = 1

attrs.name: v_nvkvint_k_m
attrs.info: Speed step used to define the integrated correction factor Kv. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h.Maximum Value : 600km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h.

attrs.name: m_nvkvint_k_m
attrs.info: Integrated correction factor Kv. This is the speed dependent integrated correction factor. M_NVKVINT(n) is valid for an estimated speed between V_NVKVINT(n) and V_NVKVINT(n+1). M_NVKVINT is valid between 0 km/h and V_NVKVINT(1)This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 2.54. Resolution/formula : 0.02. Comment : Valid betweenV_NVKVINT(k_m) and V_NVKVINT(k_m+1) If Q_NVKVINTSET(k) = 1, gives the correctionfactorifmaximum emergency brakedeceleration is

attrs.name: m_nvkvint_k_m_2
attrs.info: Integrated correction factor Kv. This is the speed dependent integrated correction factor. M_NVKVINT(n) is valid for an estimated speed between V_NVKVINT(n) and V_NVKVINT(n+1).M_NVKVINT is valid between 0 km/h and V_NVKVINT(1)This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 2.54. Resolution/formula : 0.02. Comment : Only if Q_NVKVINTSET(k) = 1 Valid betweenV_NVKVINT(k_m) and V_NVKVINT(k_m+1) Gives the correction factor if maximum emergency brake deceleration is higher than A_NVP23(k)

attrs.name: v_nvkvint
attrs.info: Speed step used to define the integrated correction factor Kv. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h. Comment : = 0 km/h

attrs.name: m_nvkvint
attrs.info: Integrated correction factor Kv. This is the speed dependent integrated correction factor. M_NVKVINT(n) is valid for an estimated speed between V_NVKVINT(n) and V_NVKVINT(n+1). M_NVKVINT is valid between 0 km/h and V_NVKVINT(1)This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 2.54. Resolution/formula : 0.02. Comment : Only if Q_NVKVINTSET = 1Valid between V_NVKVINT and V_NVKVINT(1)Gives the correction factor if maximum emergency brake deceleration is higher than A_NVP23

attrs.name: d_validnv
attrs.info: Distance to start of validity of national values. None.Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.660 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: Identity number of the country or region. Code used to identify thecountryor region in which the balise group, the RBC or the RIU is situated. These need not necessarily followadministrative or political boundaries.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023.Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : Identification of national areas to which the set applies

attrs.name: nid_c_k
attrs.info: Identity number of the country or region.Code used to identify thecountry or region in which the balise group, the RBC or the RIU is situated. These need not necessarily follow administrativeor political boundaries.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : Identification of additional national area(s) to which the set applies

attrs.name: v_nvshunt
attrs.info: Shunting mode speed limit. This variable is part ofthe National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600 km/h. Resolution/formula :5 km/h. Comment : nan

attrs.name: v_nvstff
attrs.info: Staff Responsible mode speed limit.This variable is partof the National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600 km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h. Comment : nan

attrs.name: v_nvonsight
attrs.info: On Sight mode speed limit. This variable is partof the National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600 km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h. Comment : nan

attrs.name: v_nvlimsuperv
attrs.info: Limited Supervision mode speed limit. Thisvariable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600km/h.Resolution/formula : 5 km/h. Comment : nan

attrs.name: v_nvunfit
attrs.info: Unfitted mode speed limit. This variable is part of theNational Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600 km/h. Resolution/formula : 5km/h. Comment : nan

attrs.name: v_nvrel
attrs.info: Release Speed. This variable is part of the NationalValues. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600 km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h.Comment : nan

attrs.name: d_nvroll
attrs.info: Roll away distance limit. This variable is part of theNational Values and is used for Roll Away Protection and Reverse Movement Protection. Within the (national/default) limitsof D_NVROLL the train may be moved for uncoupling.. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value :327.660 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: q_nvsbtsmperm
attrs.info: Permission to use service brake in target speed monitoring.This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 1 bit.

attrs.name: q_nvemrrls
attrs.info: Qualifier Emergency Brake Release.Permission to revoke theemergency brake command when the Permitted Speed limit is no longer exceeded or at standstill (for ceiling speedand target speed monitoring).This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 1 bit.

attrs.name: q_nvguiperm
attrs.info: Permission to use the guidance curve. This variable is part oftheNational Values. Length of variable : 1 bit.

attrs.name: q_nvsbfbperm
attrs.info: Permission to use the service brake feedback. This variable ispart of the National Values. Length of variable : 1 bit.

attrs.name: q_nvinhsmicperm
attrs.info: Permission to inhibit the compensation of the speed measurement inaccuracy. Qualifier to inhibit the compensation of the speed measurement inaccuracy for the calculation of the EBI related supervision limits. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 1 bit.

attrs.name: v_nvallowovtrp
attrs.info: Speed limit allowing the driver to select the “override” function.This variable is part of the National Values . Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h.

attrs.name: v_nvsupovtrp
attrs.info: Override speed limit to be supervised when the“override” function is active. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h.Maximum Value : 600km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h.

attrs.name: d_nvovtrp
attrs.info: Maximum distance for overriding the train trip. Thisvariable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km.Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: t_nvovtrp
attrs.info: Maximum time for overriding the train trip. This variable ispart of the National Values. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0 s. Maximum Value : 255 s. Resolution / formula :1s

attrs.name: d_nvpotrp
attrs.info: Maximum distance for reversing in Post Trip mode. Thisvariable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km.Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: t_nvcontact
attrs.info: Maximal time without new 'safe' message.. If no 'safe' message has been received from the track for more than T_NVCONTACT seconds, an appropriate action according toM_NVCONTACT must be triggered. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value :0s. Maximum Value : 254 s. Resolution/formula : 1s

attrs.name: m_nvderun
attrs.info: Entry of Driver ID permitted while running. This variable is part ofthe National Values. Length of variable : 1 bit.

attrs.name: d_nvstff
attrs.info: Maximum distance for running in Staff Responsible mode. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.660 km.Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: q_nvdriver_adhes
attrs.info: Qualifier for the modification of trackside adhesion factorbydriver. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 1 bit.

attrs.name: a_nvmaxredadh1
attrs.info: Maximum deceleration under reducedadhesion conditions (1).Maximum deceleration under reduced adhesion conditions applicable for trains: With brake position 'Passenger train in P' and with special/additional brakes independent from wheel/rail adhesion. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 6 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m/s2. Maximum Value : 3 m/s2. Resolution/formula : 0.05 m/s2.

attrs.name: a_nvmaxredadh2
attrs.info: Maximum deceleration under reducedadhesion conditions (2).Maximum deceleration under reduced adhesion conditions applicable for trains: with brakeposition 'Passenger train in P', and without special/additional brakes independent from wheel/rail adhesion. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 6 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m/s2. Maximum Value : 3 m/s2.Resolution/formula : 0.05 m/s2.

attrs.name: a_nvmaxredadh3
attrs.info: Maximum deceleration under reduced adhesion conditions (3).Maximum deceleration under reduced adhesion conditions applicable for trains: with brake position 'Freight train in P', or with brake position 'Freight train in G'. This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 6 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m/s2. Maximum Value : 3 m/s2. Resolution/formula : 0.05 m/s2.

attrs.name: q_nvlocacc
attrs.info: Default accuracy of the balise location (absolute value).This variable is part of the National Values. Length of variable : 6 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 63 m. Resolution/formula : 1 m.

attrs.name: m_nvavadh
attrs.info: Weighting factor for available wheel/rail adhesion. This variable ispart of the National Values.. Length of variable : 5 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1.

attrs.name: m_nvebcl
attrs.info: Confidence level for emergency brake safe deceleration on dry rails.This variable is part of the National Values. Based on the required confidence level, the on-board equipment selects its corresponding rolling stock correction factor Kdry_rst(V).The confidence level on emergency brake safe deceleration represents the probability of the following individual event: the rolling stock emergency brake subsystem of the train does ensure a deceleration at least equal to A_brake_emergency(V) * Kdry_rst(V), when the emergency brake is commanded on dry rails.. Length of variable : 4 bits.

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: Identity number of the country or region. Code used to identify the country or region in which the balise group, the RBC or the RIU is situated. These need not necessarily follow administrativeor political boundaries.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023. Resolution/formula : Numbers.

attrs.name: d_link
attrs.info: Incremental linking distance to next linked balise group.Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: q_newcountry
attrs.info: New Country Qualifier.Qualifier to indicate whether the next balise group is in the same country / railway administration as the one before inside the packet or not.For the first balise group in the packet, ifnot provided, it is the same country / railway administration as the one of the LRBG within the radio message, the one of balise group within the balise telegram giving the packet, or the one of the loop within the loop message giving the packet.. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_bg
attrs.info: Identity number of the balise group. Identity number of a balise group or loop within the country or region defined by NID_C. Length of variable : 14 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 16382. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : nan

attrs.name: q_linkorientation
attrs.info: Qualifier for the direction of the linked balise group. Indicateswhether the linked balise group will be overpassed by the train in nominal or reverse direction.. Length of variable : 1 bit.

attrs.name: q_linkreaction
attrs.info: linking reaction. Qualifier for the reaction to be performed ifa linking or a balise group message consistency problem occurs with the balise group linked to.. Length of variable : 2 bits.

attrs.name: q_locacc
attrs.info: Accuracy of the balise location.This Qualifier defines the absolute value of the accuracy of the Balise location (i.e., the value 63m identifies a location accuracy of +/- 63m). Length of variable : 6 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 63 m. Resolution/formula : 1 m.

attrs.name: t_vbc
attrs.info: maxValue: 255, resolution 1day

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: Identity number of the country or region. Code used to identify the country or region in which the balise group, the RBC or the RIU is situated. These need not necessarily follow administrative or political boundaries.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023.

attrs.name: l_section
attrs.info: Length of section in the MA. None. Length of variable : 15bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

structs.name: ETCSPacket_39
structs.info: Track Condition Change of traction system

attrs.name: d_traction
attrs.info: Distance to change of traction.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: m_voltage
attrs.info: Traction System voltage.It indicates the voltage of the traction system installed on a specific line or respectively that can be used by an engineThe identity of the traction system is given by M_VOLTAGE and, if M_VOLTAGE ≠ 0, by the country identifier of the traction system (NID_CTRACTION). Length of variable : 4 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Comment : Identity of the traction system

attrs.name: nid_ctraction
attrs.info: Country identifier of the traction system.It identifies the information, additional to M_VOLTAGE, required to fully define the traction system.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : NID_CTRACTION given only if M_VOLTAGE ≠ 0

structs.name: ETCSPacket_40
structs.info: Track Condition Change of allowed current consumption

attrs.name: d_current
attrs.info: Distance to change of allowed current consumption.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1 m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: m_current
attrs.info: Allowed current consumption.It defines the allowed current consumption to be used by the train. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0 A. Maximum Value : 10000 A. Resolution/formula : 10 A. Comment : Allowed current consumption.

attrs.name: m_leveltr
attrs.info: Required level

attrs.name: nid_ntc_k
attrs.info: National System identity.Each value of this variable represents the identity of a National System.. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : If M_LEVELTR(k) = 1 (NTC)

attrs.name: l_ackleveltr_k
attrs.info: Length of the acknowledgement area in rear of the required level.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: d_leveltr
attrs.info: Distance to level transition.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.660 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.. Comment : nan

attrs.name: m_leveltr
attrs.info: Required level

attrs.name: nid_ntc
attrs.info: National System identity.Each value of this variable represents the identity of a National System.. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : If M_LEVELTR = 1 (NTC)

attrs.name: l_ackleveltr
attrs.info: Length of the acknowledgement area in rear of the required level.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: q_rbc
attrs.info: Qualifier for communication session order.None. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: Identity number of the country or region.Code used to identify the country or region in which the balise group, the RBC or the RIU is situated. These need not necessarily follow administrative or political boundaries.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : RBC ETCS identity :NID_C not relevant if NID_RBC has value “Contact last known RBC

attrs.name: nid_rbc
attrs.info: RBC ETCS identity number.This variable provides the identity of the RBC belonging to NID_C.The RBC ETCS identity is given by NID_C + NID_RBC.. Length of variable : 14 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 16382. Resolution/formula : Number. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_radio
attrs.info: Radio subscriber number..Quoted as a 16 digit decimal number.The number is to be entered “left adjusted” starting with the first digit to be dialled. Padding by the special value F shall be added after the least significant digit of the number.For further information about NID_RADIO refer to SUBSET-054.. Length of variable : 64 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 9999 9999 9999 9999. Resolution/formula : Binary Coded Decimal. Comment : not relevant if NID_RBC has value “Contact last known RBC”

attrs.name: q_sleepsession
attrs.info: Session management for sleeping equipment.Qualifier for a Sleeping onboard equipment to execute or not the “session establishment” order. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

structs.name: ETCSPacket_44
structs.info: Data used by applications outside the ERTMS/ETCS system.

attrs.name: nid_xuser
attrs.info: Identity of user system.Identity of user system for which remainder of packet is intended.. Length of variable : 9 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 511. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_ntc
attrs.info: National System identity.Each value of this variable represents the identity of a National System.. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : Only if NID_XUSER = 102 (National System functions)

attrs.name: nid_mn
attrs.info: Identity of Radio Network.The NID_MN identifies the GSM-R network the calling mobile station has to register with. The NID_MN consists of up to 6 digits which are entered left adjusted into the data field, the leftmost digit is the digit to be dialled first. In case the NID_MN is shorter than 6 digits, the remaining space is to be filled with special character F. For further information about NID_MN refer to Subset-54.. Length of variable : 24 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 999999. Resolution/formula : Binary Coded Decimal.

attrs.name: m_leveltr
attrs.info: Required level

attrs.name: nid_ntc_k
attrs.info: National System identity.Each value of this variable represents the identity of a National System.. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : If M_LEVELTR(k) = 1 (NTC)

attrs.name: m_leveltr
attrs.info: Required level.None. Length of variable : 3 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_ntc
attrs.info: National System identity.Each value of this variable represents the identity of a National System.. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : If M_LEVELTR = 1 (NTC)

attrs.name: q_newcountry_k
attrs.info: New Country Qualifier.Qualifier to indicate whether the next balise group is in the same country / railway administration as the one before inside the packet or not.For the first balise group in the packet, if Q_NEWCOUNTRY = 0, it is the same country / railway administration as the one of the LRBG within the radio message, the one of balise group within the balise telegram giving the packet, or the one of the loop within the loop message giving the packet.. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_c_k
attrs.info: Identity number of the country or region.Code used to identify the country or region in which the balise group, the RBC or the RIU is situated. These need not necessarily follow administrative or political boundaries.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : if Q_NEWCOUNTRY(k) = 1

attrs.name: nid_bg_k
attrs.info: Identity number of the balise group.Identity number of a balise group or loop within the country or region defined by NID_C.. Length of variable : 14 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 16382. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : nan

structs.name: ETCSPacket_49
structs.info: List of balises for SH Area

attrs.name: m_axleloadcat_n
attrs.info: Axle load category.The values allocated below correspond to a list of increasing axle load categories (i.e. B1 > HS17, B2 > B1, D2 > C4, ….etc) and it is used by the on-board equipment to compare its axle load category with the axle load category sent by trackside.For the underlying meaning of the axle load categories listed below (with the exception of HS17) refer to CR INF TSI.The category HS17 (axle load <= 17t) corresponds to a static load per axle only, as specified in HS RST TSI clause 4.2.3.2. The introduction of this artefact is necessary to ensure backward compatibility, without any negative performance impact, in case ASPs are used on lines operated with system version X = 1.. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: v_axleload_n
attrs.info: Speed restriction related to axleload.None. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600 km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h. Comment : Speed restriction to be applied if the axle load category of the train M_AXLELOADCAT(n)

attrs.name: d_axleload_k
attrs.info: Incremental distance to the start of the next Axle load speed profile.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: l_axleload_k
attrs.info: Length of speed restriction due to Axle load.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: q_front_k
attrs.info: Qualifier for validity end point of profile element.Qualifier to indicate if a speed limit given for a profile element is to be applied until the front of the train (no train length delay) or the end of the train (train length delay) has left the element. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: d_axleload
attrs.info: Incremental distance to the start of the next Axle load speed profile.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : Only if Q_TRACKINIT = 0, D_AXLELOAD and the following variables follow

attrs.name: l_axleload
attrs.info: Length of speed restriction due to Axle load.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: q_front
attrs.info: Qualifier for validity end point of profile element.Qualifier to indicate if a speed limit given for a profile element is to be applied until the front of the train (no train length delay) or the end of the train (train length delay) has left the element. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: d_trackinit
attrs.info: Distance to start of empty profile.Distance to where initial states of the related track description in the packet shall be resumed. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : Only if Q_TRACKINIT = 1

attrs.name: d_pbd
attrs.info: Permitted Braking Distance.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.. Comment : Only if Q_TRACKINIT = 0, D_PBDand the following variables follow

attrs.name: q_gdir
attrs.info: Qualifier for gradient slope..None. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : 0 = downhill, 1 = uphill

attrs.name: g_pbdsr
attrs.info: Default gradient for PBD Speed restriction.Defines a default gradient to be used for calculation of speed restriction to ensure permitted braking distance. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255‰ . Resolution/formula : 1‰. Comment : Gradient value to be used for the calculation

attrs.name: q_pbdsr
attrs.info: Qualifier for Permitted Braking Distance.Qualifier defining whether the permitted braking distance is to be achieved with the Service Brake or Emergency Brake. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: d_pbdsr
attrs.info: Incremental distance to the start of the next speed restriction to ensure permitted braking distance.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: l_pbdsr
attrs.info: Length of speed restriction to ensure permitted braking distance.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.. Comment : nan

attrs.name: d_trackinit
attrs.info: Distance to start of empty profile.Distance to where initial states of the related track description in the packet shall be resumed. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : Only if Q_TRACKINIT = 1

attrs.name: nid_tsr
attrs.info: Identity number of Temporary Speed Restriction..None. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255. Resolution/formula : Number. Comment : nan

attrs.name: d_tsr
attrs.info: Distance to beginning of temporary speed restriction. None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: l_tsr
attrs.info: Length of the temporary speed restriction.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: q_front
attrs.info: Qualifier for validity end point of profile element. Qualifier to indicate if a speed limit given for a profile element is to be applied until the front of the train (no train length delay) or the end of the train (train length delay) has left the element. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: v_tsr
attrs.info: Permitted speed for the temporary speed restriction. None. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600 km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_tsr
attrs.info: Identity number of Temporary Speed Restriction..None. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255. Resolution/formula : Number. Comment : Identity of TSR to be revoked

attrs.name: d_trackcond
attrs.info: Track condition distance.The incremental distance to where the track conditions change.. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: l_trackcond
attrs.info: Length for which the defined track condition is valid.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : The distance for which integrity check alarms of balise transmission shall be ignored

attrs.name: d_trackcond
attrs.info: Track condition distance.The incremental distance to where the track conditions change.. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : OnlyifQ_TRACKINIT=0, D_TRACKCOND and the following variables follow

attrs.name: l_trackcond
attrs.info: Length for which the defined track condition is valid.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: d_trackinit
attrs.info: Distance to start of empty profile.Distance to where initial states of the related track description in the packet shall be resumed. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : Only if Q_TRACKINIT = 1

attrs.name: d_trackcond
attrs.info: Track condition distance.The incremental distance to where the track conditions change.. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : Only if Q_TRACKINIT = 0, D_TRACKCOND and the following variables follow

attrs.name: l_trackcond
attrs.info: Length for which the defined track condition is valid.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: m_platform
attrs.info: Type of platform. Nominal height of platform above rail level (refer to TSI infrastructure). Length of variable : 4 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: d_trackinit
attrs.info: Distance to start of empty profile.Distance to where initial states of the related track description in the packet shall be resumed. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : Only if Q_TRACKINIT = 1

attrs.name: nid_ctraction
attrs.info: set to zero or skip, if d_voltage == VT_none

structs.name: ETCSPacket_71
structs.info: This packet is used when the trackside requests a change of the adhesion factor to be used in the brake model.

attrs.name: d_adhesion
attrs.info: Distance to start of area with reduced adhesion factor. None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1 m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: l_adhesion
attrs.info: Length of reduced adhesion. Length for which the reduced adhesion factor apply.. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1 m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: m_adhesion
attrs.info: Adhesion factor. None. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

structs.name: ETCSPacket_72
structs.info: Packet for sending plain text messages

attrs.name: q_textdisplay
attrs.info: Qualifier for the combination of text message eventss.Q_TEXTDISPLAY defines whether the start/end events for text message are to be combined or not. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : Start/end events relation

attrs.name: d_textdisplay
attrs.info: Distance from where on a text shall be displayed.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.660 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : Start event

attrs.name: m_modetextdisplay
attrs.info: Onboard operating mode for text display.The text is displayed when entering / as long as in the defined mode. Length of variable : 4 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : End event

attrs.name: m_leveltextdisplay
attrs.info: Onboard operating level for text display.The text is displayed when entering / as long as in the defined level. Length of variable : 3 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : End event

attrs.name: nid_ntc
attrs.info: National System identity.Each value of this variable represents the identity of a National System.. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : If M_LEVELTEXTDISPLAY = 1 (NTC)

attrs.name: l_textdisplay
attrs.info: Length on which a text shall be displayed.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.660 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : End event

attrs.name: t_textdisplay
attrs.info: Duration for which a text shall be displayed.None. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0 s. Maximum Value : 1022 s. Resolution/formula : 1 s. Comment : End event

attrs.name: q_textconfirm
attrs.info: Qualifier for text confirmation.None. Length of variable : 2 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: q_conftextdisplay
attrs.info: Qualifier for text confirmation versus end of text display. Gives the relationship between the event 'driver acknowledgement' and the list of events 'location', 'time', 'mode', 'level' defining the end condition for text display. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : If Q_TEXTCONFIRM ≠ 0

attrs.name: q_textreport
attrs.info: Qualifier for reporting acknowledgement of text by driver.None. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : If Q_TEXTCONFIRM ≠ 0

attrs.name: nid_textmessage
attrs.info: Text message identifier.Identity of a text message from trackside to be used in a report of driver acknowledgement to the RBC. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255. Resolution/formula : Number. Comment : Only If Q_TEXTREPORT = 1

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: Identity number of the country or region.Code used to identify the country or region in which the balise group, the RBC or the RIU is situated. These need not necessarily follow administrative or political boundaries.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : Only If Q_TEXTREPORT = 1

attrs.name: nid_rbc
attrs.info: RBC ETCS identity number.This variable provides the identity of the RBC belonging to NID_C.The RBC ETCS identity is given by NID_C + NID_RBC.. Length of variable : 14 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 16382. Resolution/formula : Number. Comment : Only If Q_TEXTREPORT = 1

structs.name: ETCSPacket_76
structs.info: Packet for sending fixed text messages: identical class as ETCSPacket_72

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: Identity number of the country or region.Code used to identify the country or region in which the balise group, the RBC or the RIU is situated. These need not necessarily follow administrative or political boundaries.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : if Q_NEWCOUNTRY = 1

attrs.name: newCountry
attrs.info: Identity number of the country or region.Code used to identify the country or region in which the balise group, the RBC or the RIU is situated. These need not necessarily follow administrative or political boundaries.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : if Q_NEWCOUNTRY = 1

attrs.name: nid_bg
attrs.info: Identity number of the balise group.Identity number of a balise group or loop within the country or region defined by NID_C.. Length of variable : 14 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 16382. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : Geographical Position Reference Balise Group

attrs.name: d_posoff
attrs.info: Offset from the location reference of the geographical position reference balise group to the related track kilometre reference..The geographical position reporting function uses this variables content as an offset from the location reference of the geographical position reference balise group to the related track kilometre reference.. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: q_mposition
attrs.info: Qualifier for track kilometre direction..Qualifier to indicate the direction of counting of the geographical position track kilometre in relation to the geographical position reference balise group directionality.. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : Geographical Position counting direction

attrs.name: m_position
attrs.info: Track kilometre reference value.The geographical position reporting function uses this variables content as a reference value.. Length of variable : 24 bits. Minimum Value : 0 m. Maximum Value : 9’999’999 m. Resolution/formula : 1 m. Comment : Track kilometre reference value

attrs.name: d_mamode
attrs.info: Incremental distance to the start of the next Mode Profile.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: m_mamode
attrs.info: Required mode for a part of the MA. None. Length of variable : 2 bits. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : OS, LS, SH

attrs.name: v_mamode
attrs.info: Required mode related speed.None. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600 km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h. Comment : nan

attrs.name: l_mamode
attrs.info: Length of the area of the required mode. None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.660 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: l_ackmamode
attrs.info: Length of the acknowledgement area in rear of the start of the required mode.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: q_mamode
attrs.info: Qualifier to indicate the supervision of the beginning of the mode profile. This qualifier defines whether the beginning of the mode profile shall be considered as the SvL, or if the SvL shall be derived from the movement authority.. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: v_lx
attrs.info: Permitted speed for the LX speed restriction.Speed at which the LX can be passed when it is not protected. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600 km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h. Comment : Only if Q_LXSTATUS = 1

attrs.name: q_stoplx
attrs.info: Qualifier for stopping in rear of the LX.Indicates whether stopping the train in rear of a non protected LX is required. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : Only if Q_LXSTATUS = 1

attrs.name: l_stoplx
attrs.info: Length of the stopping area in rear of the start location of the LX area.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : Only if Q_STOPLX = 1

attrs.name: nid_lx
attrs.info: Identity number of the Level Crossing..None. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255. Resolution/formula : Number. Comment : nan

attrs.name: d_lx
attrs.info: Distance to LX start location.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: l_lx
attrs.info: Length of the LX area.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

structs.name: ETCSPacket_90
structs.info: Track Ahead Free up to level 2/3 transition location

attrs.name: nid_bg
attrs.info: Identity number of the balise group.Identity number of a balise group or loop within the country or region defined by NID_C.. Length of variable : 14 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 16382. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : Level 2/3 transition location balise group

attrs.name: d_rbctr
attrs.info: Distance to RBC transition.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: Identity number of the country or region.Code used to identify the country or region in which the balise group, the RBC or the RIU is situated. These need not necessarily follow administrative or political boundaries.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : “Accepting” RBC identity

attrs.name: nid_rbc
attrs.info: RBC ETCS identity number.This variable provides the identity of the RBC belonging to NID_C.The RBC ETCS identity is given by NID_C + NID_RBC.. Length of variable : 14 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 16382. Resolution/formula : Number. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_radio
attrs.info: Radio subscriber number..Quoted as a 16 digit decimal number.The number is to be entered “left adjusted” starting with the first digit to be dialled. Padding by the special value F shall be added after the least significant digit of the number.For further information about NID_RADIO refer to SUBSET-054.. Length of variable : 64 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 9999 9999 9999 9999. Resolution/formula : Binary Coded Decimal. Comment : 'Accepting' RBC radio subscriber number

attrs.name: q_sleepsession
attrs.info: Session management for sleeping equipment.Qualifier for a Sleeping onboard equipment to execute or not the 'session establishment' order. Length of variable : 1 bit.

attrs.name: q_aspect
attrs.info: Aspect of “danger for shunting” signal.. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: q_riu
attrs.info: Qualifier for communication session order.None. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: Identity number of the country or region.Code used to identify the country or region in which the balise group, the RBC or the RIU is situated. These need not necessarily follow administrative or political boundaries.. Length of variable : 10 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 1023. Resolution/formula : Numbers. Comment : Refers to the next main signal balise group (relevant only for the case of establishing a communication session)

attrs.name: nid_riu
attrs.info: Identity of radio infill unit.This variable provides the identity of the RIU belonging to NID_C.The RIU ETCS identity is given by NID_C + NID_RIU.. Length of variable : 14 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 16383. Resolution/formula : Number. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_radio
attrs.info: Radio subscriber number..Quoted as a 16 digit decimal number.The number is to be entered “left adjusted” starting with the first digit to be dialled. Padding by the special value F shall be added after the least significant digit of the number.For further information about NID_RADIO refer to SUBSET-054.. Length of variable : 64 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 9999 9999 9999 9999. Resolution/formula : Binary Coded Decimal. Comment : nan

attrs.name: d_infill
attrs.info: Distance to location where to connect/disconnect to a radio infill unit.None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_bg
attrs.info: Identity number of the balise group.Identity number of a balise group or loop within the country or region defined by NID_C.. Length of variable : 14 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 16382. Resolution/formula : Numbers.

attrs.name: nid_loop
attrs.info: Identity number of the loop.Identity number of a loop within the country or region defined by NID_C given in the EOLM balise header.. Length of variable : 14 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 16383. Resolution/formula : Numbers.

attrs.name: d_loop
attrs.info: Distance between EOLM and start of loop.The EOLM specifies the distance to the beginning of the loop transmission. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.660 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: l_loop
attrs.info: Length of loop.L_LOOP specifies the length of the loop starting from the distance indicated by D_LOOP. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.660 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

attrs.name: q_loopdir
attrs.info: Qualifier to indicate the direction of the loop.Indicates LOOP-reference direction in relation to EOLM direction. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: q_sscode
attrs.info: Spread Spectrum Code for Euroloop.Specifies the code required to receive telegrams from a specific Euroloop installation.. Length of variable : 4 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 14. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: nid_bg
attrs.info: Identity number of the balise group.Identity number of a balise group or loop within the country or region defined by NID_C.. Length of variable : 14 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 16382. Resolution/formula : Numbers.

attrs.name: q_srstop
attrs.info: 'Stop if in Staff Responsible' information. Specifies whether an onboard equipment in staff responsible has to stop or not. Length of variable : 1 bit.

attrs.name: d_startreverse
attrs.info: Distance to start of reversing permitted area. None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: l_reversearea
attrs.info: Length of the reversing permitted area. None. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.670 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: d_reverse
attrs.info: Maximum distance to run in RV mode. Distance from reference location to end location of the distance to run in RV mode. Length of variable : 15 bits. Minimum Value : 0 cm. Maximum Value : 327.660 km. Resolution/formula : 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE. Comment : nan

attrs.name: v_reverse
attrs.info: Reversing mode speed limit. None. Length of variable : 7 bits. Minimum Value : 0 km/h. Maximum Value : 600 km/h. Resolution/formula : 5 km/h. Comment : nan

structs.name: ETCSPacket_141
structs.info: Default Gradient for Temporary Speed Restriction

attrs.name: g_tsr
attrs.info: Default gradient for TSR supervision. defines a default gradient to be used for TSR supervision when no gradient profile (packet 21) is available.. Length of variable : 8 bits. Minimum Value : 0. Maximum Value : 255‰.

structs.name: ETCSPacket_145
structs.info: Inhibition of balise group message consistency reaction

attrs.name: q_lssma
attrs.info: Qualifier for the LSSMA display.This qualifier tells whether the on-board has to toggle on/off the display of the lowest supervised speed within the MA. Length of variable : 1 bit. Minimum Value : None. Maximum Value : None. Resolution/formula : None. Comment : nan

attrs.name: t_lssma
attrs.info: Delay to toggle on the LSSMA display.. Length of variable : 8 bit. Minimum Value : 0 s. Maximum Value : 255 s. Resolution/formula : 1 s. Comment : Only if Q_LSSMA = 1

structs.name: ETCSPacket_254
structs.info: Default balise, loop or RIU information

structs.name: ETCSPacket_255
structs.info: End of Information, This packet consists only of NID_PACKET containing 8 bit 1smessage/telegram when receiving eight bits set to one in the NID_PACKET field.
